Key Match Events: Klaus Gjasula scored for both teams
Albania scored first through Qazim Laci
Gjasula scored the equalizer for Albania in stoppage time
Post-Match Reflections: Gjasula expressed joy at scoring the equalizer
Kramaric was disappointed Croatia didn't win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Hamburg, Germany
The stadium was split between Croatia and Albania fans
Fans in Croatia's section set off flares repeatedly
Others: Albania lost to defending champion Italy 2-1 in its first match
Croatia lost 3-0 to Spain in their opening Group B match
